results.title: The Protective Effect of Metformin Use on Early Nd:YAG Laser Capsulotomy
results.text_hl: To determine the effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on early Nd:YAG laser treatment for @<m>DISEASE_Capsule_Opacification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058442 @@@posterior capsule opacification@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Capsule_Opacification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058442 @@@PCO@@@) and to explore a molecular mechanism to explain a possible protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against @<m>DISEASE_Capsule_Opacification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058442 @@@PCO@@@.

citations.NLM: Patnaik JL, Christopher KL, Pedler MG, Shieh B, Petrash CC, Wagner BD, Mandava N, Lynch AM, Palestine AG, Petrash JM. The Protective Effect of Metformin Use on Early Nd:YAG Laser Capsulotomy Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci. 2021 Aug 2;62(10):24. PMID: 34415985
citations.BibTeX: @article{34415985, title={The Protective Effect of Metformin Use on Early Nd:YAG Laser Capsulotomy}, author={Patnaik JL and Christopher KL and Pedler MG and Shieh B and Petrash CC and Wagner BD and Mandava N and Lynch AM and Palestine AG and Petrash JM}, journal={Invest Ophthalmol Vis Sci}, volume={62}, number={10}, pages={24}}

results.title: Metformin attenuates the epithelial-mesenchymal transition of lens epithelial cells through the AMPK/TGF-beta/Smad2/3 signalling pathway.
results.text_hl: We investigated whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Mtf@@@ can inhibit EMT and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ in HLECs to prevent and treat @<m>DISEASE_Capsule_Opacification</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D058442 @@@PCO@@@ and elucidated the potential molecular mechanism.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Tian Y, Shang Z, Zhang B, Hua X, Yuan X. Metformin attenuates the epithelial-mesenchymal transition of lens epithelial cells through the AMPK/TGF-beta/Smad2/3 signalling pathway. Exp Eye Res. 2021 Nov;212():108763. PMID: 34517004
citations.BibTeX: @article{34517004, title={Metformin attenuates the epithelial-mesenchymal transition of lens epithelial cells through the AMPK/TGF-beta/Smad2/3 signalling pathway.}, author={Wang L and Tian Y and Shang Z and Zhang B and Hua X and Yuan X}, journal={Exp Eye Res}, volume={212}, pages={108763}}
